title: Analyst recommendations: AMD, Cloudflare, Intel, ITV, PayPal...

The list only includes companies that have been the subject of a change of opinion or price target, or of a new coverage. It may be updated during the session. This information can be used to shed light on movements in certain stocks or on market sentiment towards a company.
